summary_analyst: CVE-2025-2747 is a remote code execution vulnerability in Kentico Xperience that allows an attacker to exploit a flaw in the platform's file upload functionality to execute arbitrary code on the server.

description: CVE-2025-2747 is a remote code execution vulnerability in Kentico Xperience that allows an attacker to exploit a flaw in the platform's file upload functionality to execute arbitrary code on the server.
